title: Bug Splat on Client startup

body:
This actually isn't a new problem, and before anyone says, I don't use Avast, and never have. Avast is not the cause of my issues.

Last year around July, my LoL launcher simply stopped working. Anytime I tried to open the client, it bug splatted immediately after the League of Legends logo appeared. I tried for days to find a fix, but nothing worked from deleting RADs folders to full reinstalls to creating new users and trying it out on those. Nothing worked, and I eventually gave up and stopped playing altogether. I figured maybe in a few months time it'd work again.   
   
Obviously not. I have tried all day to make League of Legends work, but I get the same thing happening. I get a bug splat when trying to open client, I tried uninstalling and reinstalling, I've tried playing with DirectX and AdobeAir, I've tried disabling UAC, I've tried everything and anything that I can find using online searches and nothing works. I really don't know what to do anymore. 

http://i.imgur.com/gUKJ4br.jpg - What happens when I double click the LoL icon

I've attached my latest bug splat log. I really don't know what else I can do to get this shit working. I'd like to actually play with my mates when I play a MOBA rather than playing with randoms in HOTS or DOTA

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you made any recent changes to your system? 

* Are all your drivers up to date? 
* Is your Windows install up to date?
* Do you have a system restore point from before this started occurring to potentially identify the change to your system that started causing this issue?
* What antivirus software do you use? Have you tried adding league as an exception in both your antivirus and firewall?

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=GqnhFX2j,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-13T08:44:24.960+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> Have you made any recent changes to your system? 
> 
> * Are all your drivers up to date? 
> * Is your Windows install up to date?
> * Do you have a system restore point from before this started occurring to potentially identify the change to your system that started causing this issue?
> * What antivirus software do you use? Have you tried adding league as an exception in both your antivirus and firewall?

Yes, all drivers were up to date a year ago and now. No changes were made preceding the first issue last year - in fact, the PC was brand new and was running LoL fine for a month before a patch dropped.
Yes, Windows is up to date   
No, I do not. It happened, IIRC, immediately after a patch around mid 2015. I can't provide any other information about my PC's state at that time.
AVG, yes it's added as an exception (both executable and the parent Riot Games folder) as well as to Windows Firewall.

Could you please run dxdiag and reply with the results, thanks.

This is going to sound silly, you also mentioned you disabled UAC, did you run the game as Administrator after doing this? All disabling UAC does is disable the prompt.
Could you attempt a [clean boot of Windows](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq7) and let me know if this helps.

Same bug splat error

Oh and in response to that other thing about UAC, yep, I ran as administrator

Could you run memtest86 for me, there is a guide [here](http://www.overclockers.com/forums/showthread.php/409152-Memtest86-Guide-How-To-s) on how to accomplish this.

There's also a video here on how to use the usb auto installer.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NaHL9usaM4Q

http://i.imgur.com/ONzhx4K.png

Zero errors. Man that took a long time, 9 and a half hours. Good thing I was out all day anyway!

Just to double check, you've [reinstalled league completely](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)?

I'm going to have to get you to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support and include as much detail as possible about everything you've tried and everything ive had you try, don't forget to attach your logs from the latest bugsplat.
Yes, completely reinstalled. I'm away from home until Saturday but Ill submit a ticket then. Thanks for your help
